titleStmt.title: The Maidens complain[t] against coffee, or, The coffee-house discovered beseiged, stormed, taken, untyled and lai[d] open to publick view ... written by Merc. Democ. at his chamber in the world in the moon for the ben[efit] of all the mad-merry-conceited people under the sun.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
